response.original_title: "Reel Around The Fountain: The Smiths on Tour 1984
response.overview: A film intended as a tour souvenir for the band, roadies and tour staff was put together in 1984 by sound engineer Grant Showbiz with Jonathan Barnett and Hetty Church using stage, soundcheck and backstage footage filmed on this date.
response.title: "Reel Around The Fountain: The Smiths on Tour 1984
